title: Calling all 3v3 players
body: Hey everyone with the release of twisted treeline ranked on thursdays i thought it would be a good idea to make a platform for interacting and socialising with players who also love the game type, the platform used will be discord so you can talk builds strats or even find players for a team. also feel free to add me in league will be setting up a club chat. thanks!

replies.body: Any chance you can send me an add on league. I will probably forget by the time im on next.
